00071 #define INITIALIZED     (1)
00072 #define NOT_INITIALIZED 0
00073 
00078 #define LOCKFILE_PERMS 0600

00083 static int lock_descriptor;
00084 
00089 static void *link_handle;
00090 static void *net_handle;
00091 static void *reliable_handle;
00092 static void *unreliable_handle;

00222 int kurud_init(char *config_file) {
00223         int code;
00224 
00225         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00226 
00227         /* configure daemon */
00228         TRY(kurud_configure(config_file), ERR(REASON_CONFIGURATION));
00229 
00230         TRY(lock_file(), ERR(REASON_LOCK_FILE));
00231 
00232         TRY(pthread_cond_init(&finish_condition, NULL) == 0,
00233                         ERR(REASON_CONDVAR_CREATE));
00234 
00235         TRY(pthread_mutex_init(&finish_mutex, NULL) == 0, ERR(REASON_MUTEX_CREATE));
00236 
00237         threads_init = INITIALIZED;
00238 
00239         /* load link module */
00240         TRY(load_link_module(kurud_get_module_file(LAYER_LINK),
00241                                         kurud_get_module_config(LAYER_LINK)),
00242                         ERROR(REASON_LOAD_MODULE, MODULE_LINK));
00243 
00244         link_init = INITIALIZED;
00245 
00246         /* load net module */
00247         TRY(load_net_module(kurud_get_module_file(LAYER_NET),
00248                                         kurud_get_module_config(LAYER_NET)),
00249                         ERROR(REASON_LOAD_MODULE, MODULE_NET));
00250 
00251         net_init = INITIALIZED;
00252 
00253         /* load reliable module */
00254         TRY(load_reliable_module(kurud_get_module_file(LAYER_RELIABLE)),
00255                         ERROR(REASON_LOAD_MODULE, MODULE_RELIABLE));
00256 
00257         reliable_init = INITIALIZED;
00258 
00259         /* load unreliable module */
00260         /* load reliable module */
00261         TRY(load_unreliable_module(kurud_get_module_file(LAYER_UNRELIABLE)),
00262                         ERROR(REASON_LOAD_MODULE, MODULE_UNRELIABLE));
00263 
00264         unreliable_init = INITIALIZED;
00265 
00266         TRY(kurud_console_init(), ERR(REASON_CONSOLE_INIT));
00267 
00268         console_init = INITIALIZED;
00269 
00270         TRY(signal(SIGINT, handler_sigint) != SIG_ERR, ERR(REASON_SIGNAL));
00271 
00272         TRY(signal(SIGPIPE, handler_sigpipe) != SIG_ERR, ERR(REASON_SIGNAL));
00273 
00274         code = KURUD_OK;
00275 end:
00276         return code;
00277 }
00278 
00279 int kurud_finish() {
00280         int code;
00281 
00282         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00283 
00284         TRY(pthread_cond_broadcast(&finish_condition) == 0, ERR(REASON_PTHREADS));
00285 
00286         if (threads_init) {
00287                 TRY(pthread_cond_destroy(&finish_condition) == 0,
00288                                 ERR(REASON_CONDVAR_DESTROY));
00289 
00290                 TRY(pthread_mutex_destroy(&finish_mutex) == 0,
00291                                 ERR(REASON_MUTEX_DESTROY));
00292 
00293                 threads_init = NOT_INITIALIZED;
00294         }
00295 
00296         if (console_init == INITIALIZED) {
00297                 console_init = NOT_INITIALIZED;
00298                 kurud_console_finish();
00299         }
00300         if (link_init == INITIALIZED) {
00301                 link_init = NOT_INITIALIZED;
00302                 unload_link_module();
00303         }
00304         if (net_init == INITIALIZED) {
00305                 net_init = NOT_INITIALIZED;
00306                 unload_net_module();
00307         }
00308         if (reliable_init == INITIALIZED) {
00309                 reliable_init = NOT_INITIALIZED;
00310                 unload_reliable_module();
00311         }
00312         if (unreliable_init == INITIALIZED) {
00313                 unreliable_init = NOT_INITIALIZED;
00314                 unload_unreliable_module();
00315         }
00316 
00317         TRY(unlock_file(), ERR(REASON_UNLOCK_FILE));
00318 
00319         kurud_unconfigure();
00320 
00321         code = KURUD_OK;
00322 end:
00323         liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "kurud %s finalized.");
00324         return code;
00325 }
00326 
00327 int kurud_wait() {
00328         int code;
00329 
00330         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00331 
00332         TRY(pthread_mutex_lock(&finish_mutex) == 0, ERR(REASON_MUTEX_INVALID));
00333         TRY(pthread_cond_wait(&finish_condition, &finish_mutex) == 0,
00334                         ERR(REASON_CONDVAR_INVALID));
00335         TRY(pthread_mutex_unlock(&finish_mutex) == 0, ERR(REASON_MUTEX_INVALID));
00336 
00337         code = KURUD_OK;
00338 end:
00339         return code;
00340 }

00346 int load_symbol(void **address, void *handle, const char *symbol) {
00347         int code;
00348 
00349         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00350 
00351         TRY(*address = dlsym(handle, symbol), ERROR(REASON_DLSYM, dlerror()));
00352 
00353         code = KURUD_OK;
00354 end:
00355         return code;
00356 }
00357 
00358 int load_link_module(char *library, char *config) {
00359         int code;
00360         void *(*get_interface) ();
00361         void *(*get_console) ();
00362 
00363         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00364 
00365         /* Load the link library. */
00366         TRY(link_handle = dlopen(library, RTLD_LAZY),
00367                         ERROR(REASON_DLOPEN, dlerror()));
00368 
00369         TRY(load_symbol(*(void **)&get_interface, link_handle,
00370                                         "link_get_interface"), ERROR(REASON_LOAD_SYMBOL,
00371                                         dlerror()));
00372 
00373         kurud_link_layer = (layer_link_t *) get_interface();
00374 
00375         /* load the link_console structure */
00376         TRY(load_symbol(*(void **)&get_console, link_handle,
00377                                         "console_get_interface"), ERROR(REASON_LOAD_SYMBOL,
00378                                         dlerror()));
00379 
00380         kurud_link_console = (layer_console_t *) get_console();
00381 
00382         /* starts the link layer */
00383         TRY(kurud_link_layer->link_init(config), ERR(REASON_LINK_INIT));
00384 
00385         code = KURUD_OK;
00386 end:
00387         return code;
00388 }
00389 
00390 int unload_link_module() {
00391         int code;
00392 
00393         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00394 
00395         if (kurud_link_layer) {
00396                 if (kurud_link_layer->link_finish != NULL) {
00397                         kurud_link_layer->link_finish();
00398                 }
00399                 TRY(dlclose(link_handle) != -1, ERROR(REASON_DLCLOSE, dlerror()));
00400                 memset(&kurud_link_layer, 0, sizeof(kurud_link_layer));
00401                 link_handle = NULL;
00402         }
00403 
00404         code = KURUD_OK;
00405 end:
00406         return code;
00407 }
00408 
00409 int load_net_module(char *library, char *config) {
00410         int code;
00411         void *(*get_interface) ();
00412         void *(*get_console) ();
00413 
00414         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00415 
00416         /* Load the link library. */
00417         TRY(net_handle = dlopen(library, RTLD_LAZY),
00418                         ERROR(REASON_DLOPEN, dlerror()));
00419 
00420         TRY(load_symbol(*(void **)&get_interface, net_handle, "net_get_interface"),
00421                         ERROR(REASON_LOAD_SYMBOL, dlerror()));
00422 
00423         kurud_net_layer = (layer_net_t *) get_interface();
00424 
00425         /* load the link_console structure */
00426         TRY(load_symbol(*(void **)&get_console, net_handle,
00427                                         "console_get_interface"), ERROR(REASON_LOAD_SYMBOL,
00428                                         dlerror()));
00429 
00430         kurud_net_console = (layer_console_t *) get_console();
00431 
00432         /* starts the link layer */
00433         TRY(kurud_net_layer->net_init(config), ERR(REASON_NET_INIT));
00434 
00435         code = KURUD_OK;
00436 end:
00437         return code;
00438 }
00439 
00440 int unload_net_module() {
00441         int code;
00442 
00443         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00444 
00445         if (net_handle) {
00446                 if (kurud_net_layer->net_finish != NULL) {
00447                         kurud_net_layer->net_finish();
00448                 }
00449                 TRY(dlclose(link_handle) != -1, ERROR(REASON_DLCLOSE, dlerror()));
00450                 net_handle = NULL;
00451                 memset(&kurud_net_layer, 0, sizeof(kurud_net_layer));
00452         }
00453 
00454         code = KURUD_OK;
00455 end:
00456         return code;
00457 }

00460         return KURUD_OK;
00461 }
00462 
00463 int unload_reliable_module() {
00464         int code;
00465 
00466         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00467 
00468         if (reliable_handle) {
00469                 dlclose(reliable_handle);
00470                 reliable_handle = NULL;
00471                 /*reliable_initialize = NULL;
00472                  * reliable_finalize = NULL; */
00473                 /* memset(&freedomd_reliable_layer, 0, 
00474                  *      sizeof(freedomd_reliable_layer)); */
00475         }
00476 
00477         code = KURUD_OK;
00478         return code;
00479 }

00484 
00485 int unload_unreliable_module() {
00486         int code;
00487 
00488         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00489 
00490         if (unreliable_handle) {
00491                 dlclose(unreliable_handle);
00492                 unreliable_handle = NULL;
00493                 /*unreliable_initialize = NULL;
00494                  * unreliable_finalize = NULL; */
00495                 /* memset(&freedomd_unreliable_layer, 0, 
00496                  *      sizeof(freedomd_unreliable_layer)); */
00497         }
00498 
00499         code = KURUD_OK;
00500         return code;
00501 }
00502 
00503 void handler_sigint(int signal) {
00504         liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "SIGINT received.");
00505         TRY(pthread_cond_signal(&finish_condition) == 0, ERR(REASON_PTHREADS));
00506 end:
00507         return;
00508 }
00509 
00510 void handler_sigpipe(int signal) {
00511         liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "SIGPIPE received.");
00512         /* Ignore. This is necessary to handle the clients disconnections. */
00513 }
00514 
00515 int lock_file() {
00516         int code;
00517 
00518         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00519 
00520         lock_descriptor =
00521                         open(kurud_get_lock_file(), O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_EXCL,
00522                         LOCKFILE_PERMS);
00523         ASSERT(lock_descriptor != -1, ERROR(REASON_LOCK_FILE, strerror(errno)));
00524 
00525         code = KURUD_OK;
00526 end:
00527         return code;
00528 }
00529 
00530 int unlock_file() {
00531         int code;
00532 
00533         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00534 
00535         if (lock_descriptor != -1) {
00536                 TRY(unlink(kurud_get_lock_file()) != -1,
00537                                 ERROR(REASON_UNLINK, strerror(errno)));
00538                 TRY(close(lock_descriptor) != -1,
00539                                 ERROR(REASON_SOCKET_CLOSE, strerror(errno)));
00540         }
00541         code = KURUD_OK;
00542 end:
00543         return code;
00544 }
